## Current & Recent Courses

### Human Physiology and Anatomy I (BMS 507)
**Level:** Undergraduate (≈72 students)  
**Terms:** Aug 2024 – Dec 2024; Aug 2025 – Dec 2025  
**Role:** Graduate Teaching Assistant / Instructor

**Responsibilities**
- Led lab sections and supported lecture activities; prepared and graded assessments.
- Guided identification of gross and microscopic structures (bones, muscles, organs, neural systems).
- Ran brain and eye dissections; managed lab prep, safety, and equipment.
- Supported exam proctoring and review sessions.
